response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item offers unparalleled functionality and quality, making it an invaluable asset for anyone seeking excellence. Considering its exceptional features and craftsmanship, I am extending an exclusive offer for you to acquire this product at a special price of $12,000. This opportunity not only secures a remarkable addition to your collection but also supports our commitment to innovation and customer satisfaction. I trust that you will find this offer compelling and look forward to your positive response. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our product, and I hope we can collaborate soon.", "product_price": 12000}
